description:
Posting: Nice to meet you! My name is Rosa. I am hiring a house cleaning provider working in Florida City, Florida. I'm hoping to chat with a caring individual who has part-time availability. Service Requirements: Our home needs room clean up, bathroom cleaning, and window washing. Ideally, you own all necessay supplies. The best-possible service provider would have at least a year of experience although this isn't required to be hired. Additional Availability: We can be flexible for the right candidate. Getting In Touch: You can reach out via this website and I will follow up.

Services

    <li>General Room Cleaning</li>
title: House Cleaner
